title: Ticket #6471: use max_materialize in submit to enable late materialization
description:
It should be possible to submit a late materialization job using only statements in the submit file. In order to allow for this, condor_submit will be refactored so that it uses the same parsing loop for normal submits and for -factory submits - this will allow for more flexible policy about which jobs are late materialization. possible triggers will be

  • use of max_materialize statement (or max_materialize < <number_of_procs>?)
  • <number_of_procs> to be submitted greater than some limit (1?)
  • use of the -factory argument to condor_submit (arg should be renamed?)
  • admin policy controlling/influencing the above.
